name: MSStickerView
desc: A view for displaying a sticker.

items.name: init(frame: CGRect, sticker: MSSticker?)
items.desc: Initializes a new sticker view with the provided sticker and frame.

items.name: var animationDuration: TimeInterval
items.desc: The amount of time it takes to complete the sticker’s animation.

items.name: func isAnimating() -> Bool
items.desc: Returns a Boolean value that indicates whether the sticker is animating.

items.name: func startAnimating()
items.desc: Starts the sticker’s animation, beginning with the first frame.
